General.Name: TrueLight
General.Description: TrueLight Corporation designs, develops, and supplies optical components in Asia. The company offers high-bandwidth semiconductor lasers, photodiode components and submodules, optical engines and cables, vertical cavity surface emitting lasers light source for cloud\data center, 5G mobile internet base station interconnections, and proximity/flood illumination/3D sensing applications in smartphones. It serves optical fiber transceiver, internet equipment, and smartphone module manufacturers. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4.Name: Vichy  Ou
4.Title: Sr. Director of Sales & Marketing Division
